sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-container>
      <v-row class="justify-center">
        <v-card max-width="500">
          <v-row justify="center">
            <v-card-title>Register</v-card-title>
          </v-row>

          <v-form v-model="valid" ref="form">
            <v-container>
              <v-row justify="center">
                <v-col cols="12" md="11">
                  <v-text-field
                    v-model="firstname"
                    :rules="nameRules"
                    :counter="10"
                    label="First name"
                    required
                  ></v-text-field>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12" md="11">
                  <v-text-field
                    v-model="lastname"
                    :rules="lastnameRules"
                    :counter="15"
                    label="Last name"
                    required
                  ></v-text-field>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12" md="11">
                  <v-text-field v-model="userid" :rules="useridRules" label="Id" required></v-text-field>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12" md="11">
                  <v-text-field v-model="password" :rules="passwordRules" label="Password" required></v-text-field>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="12" md="11">
                  <v-text-field
                    v-model="department"
                    :rules="[v => !!v || 'Department is required']"
                    label="Department"
                    required
                  ></v-text-field>
                </v-col>

                <v-col col="12" md="11">
                  <v-select
                    v-model="sectionSelected"
                    :items="section"
                    :rules="[v => !!v || 'Section is required']"
                    label="Section"
                  ></v-select>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
            </v-container>
          </v-form>
          <v-card-actions>
            <v-row justify="end">
              <v-btn rounded color="secondary" @click="submit" id="submit">Submit</v-btn>
            </v-row>
          </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import router from "../router";

export default {
  data: () => ({
    valid: false,
    firstname: "",
    lastname: "",
    nameRules: [
      v => !!v || "Name is required",
      v => v.length <= 10 || "Name must be less than 10 characters"
    ],
    password: "",
    passwordRules: [
      v => !!v || "Password is required",
      v => v.length >= 8 || "Password must be atleast  8 characters"
    ],
    lastnameRules: [
      v => !!v || "Lastname is required",
      v => v.length <= 20 || "Name must be less than 20 characters"
    ],
    userid: "",
    useridRules: [
      v => !!v || "Id is required",
      v => v.length <= 15 || "Id must be less than 15 characters"
    ],
    sectionSelected: null,
    section: [],
    department: ""
  }),

  methods: {
    async submit() {
      if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
        axios
          .post('/usermanage/insertuser', {
            username: this.firstname,
            userlast: this.lastname,
            userid: this.userid,
            usersection: this.sectionSelected,
            userdepartment: this.department,
            userpassword: this.password,
            userrole:'user'
          })
          .then(function(response) {
            console.log(response);
            router.push({ name: "login" });
          })
          .catch(function(error) {
            console.log(error);
          });
      } else {
        console.log("invalid");
      }
    }
  },

  created: async function() {
    await axios
      .post('/admin/getallsectionnum', {})
      .then(response => {
        console.log(response.data.data);
        let i = 0;
        while (i < response.data.data.length) {
          this.section.push(response.data.data[i].sectionnumber);
          i++;
        }
      })
      .catch(function(error) {
        console.log(error);
      });
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
#submit {
  margin-right: 6%;
}
</style>
